00046 const TittmColumnDefinition CRTM_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS[] = {
00047   {std::string("Index"),              1, 0, std::string(".*"), NULL },
00048   {std::string("CHP Filename"),       1, 1, std::string(".*"), NULL},
00049   {std::string("Gene"),               1, 2, std::string(".*"), NULL },

00081 ComprehensiveReportTableModel::ComprehensiveReportTableModel(const RunTimeEnvironment &rte,  const string &reportFileName) :
00082     TranslationInputTsvTableModel(rte, reportFileName, CRTM_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS, (sizeof(CRTM_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS) / sizeof(CRTM_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS[0])), true, NULL, NULL, false)
00083 {
00084 
00085 
00086 
00087 
00088 }

00092 /**
00093  * ComprehensiveReportTableModel::getColumnName
00094  * Synopsis:
00095  *
00096  *
00097  */
00098 /*****************************************************************************/
00099 std::string ComprehensiveReportTableModel::getColumnName(int col)  {
00100 
00101   assert( col < m_rows[0].size() );
00102   
00103   return (CRTM_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS[col].m_columnName);
00104   
00105 }
00106 // end ComprehensiveReportTableModel::getColumnName
00107 /*****************************************************************************/
00108 /*****************************************************************************/
00109 /**
00110  * ComprehensiveReportTableModel::getColumnIndex
00111  * Synopsis:
00112  *
00113  *
00114  */
00115 /*****************************************************************************/
00116 int ComprehensiveReportTableModel::getColumnIndex(std::string columnName)  {
00117 
00118   if ( m_columnIndex.count(columnName) != 0 ) {
00119     return m_columnIndex[columnName];
00120   }
00121 
00122   for ( int col = 0; col < m_rows[0].size(); col++ ) {
00123     if ( CRTM_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS[col].m_columnName == columnName ) {
00124       m_columnIndex[columnName] = col;
00125       return col;
00126     }
00127   }
00128 
00129   APT_ERR_ABORT("Programmer Error: invalid column name given for comprehensive report.");
00130   
00131   
00132   return -1;
00133   
00134 }
00135 // end ComprehensiveReportTableModel::getColumnIndex
